short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to switch Chrome to dark mode. Switch to night / day mode with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to switch Chrome to dark mode. With just one click, effortlessly toggle between night and day modes, enhancing your browsing experience with a darker interface for night-time or a lighter one for the day. This extension is safe to use, and installation is simple. To install, just click 'Add to Chrome' and enjoy an instant transformation to dark mode. If you ever want to remove it, simply go to your Chrome extensions menu, click 'Remove,' and the extension will be safely uninstalled without affecting your browser settings.
